characters.name: Media
characters.introduction: As a media person, your role is to capture the truth amidst the chaos of the protest.
characters.currentSituation: The protest is escalating, and there are conflicting reports about the police's actions.

choices.text: Interview protestors to get their side of the story.
choices.outcome: You gather firsthand accounts, but risk being targeted by the police.

choices.text: Focus on documenting the police's actions.
choices.outcome: You capture important footage but might miss critical information from the protestors.

characters.name: Rookie Officer
characters.introduction: You are a new recruit tasked with keeping order during the protest.
characters.currentSituation: Tensions are rising, and you must make quick decisions to maintain control.

choices.text: Try to negotiate with the protestors to de-escalate the situation.
choices.outcome: The protestors listen to you, but your inexperience shows, and things could still spiral out of control.

choices.text: Use tear gas to disperse the crowd.
choices.outcome: The crowd scatters, but the use of force could escalate tensions.

characters.name: Veteran Officer
characters.introduction: As a seasoned officer, you are familiar with controlling large crowds, but the situation today is tense.
characters.currentSituation: Protestors are growing restless, and your experience tells you that things could go wrong fast.

choices.text: Order your unit to form a defensive line.
choices.outcome: The crowd backs off slightly, but the protestors are still agitated.

choices.text: Attempt to arrest the protest leaders.
choices.outcome: You remove key agitators, but this could spark anger among the remaining protestors.

characters.name: Protestor
characters.introduction: You are part of a group protesting for change, determined to make your voice heard.
characters.currentSituation: The police are forming up, and tensions are at a breaking point.
characters.weaknesses: Limited protection, vulnerability to law enforcement

choices.text: Lead a chant to keep the protestors united and peaceful.
choices.outcome: The crowd follows your lead, but the police are getting restless.

choices.text: Encourage protestors to confront the police peacefully.
choices.outcome: Tensions rise as protestors approach the police lines, risking escalation.

characters.name: Politician
characters.introduction: As a politician, you must balance the demands of the protestors with the need to maintain order.

choices.text: Address the crowd to try and calm the situation.
choices.outcome: Your speech resonates with some, but others remain unsatisfied.

choices.text: Privately meet with the protest leaders to discuss their demands.
choices.outcome: You gain valuable insight but risk appearing indecisive to the public.
